entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, a student at Hogwarts. He is described as stretching out his arms and lifting an egg in his wet hands.

entities.name: egg
entities.description: An object that Harry is holding and trying to open. It makes a loud screeching sound when opened.

entities.name: filch
entities.description: A character mentioned in the story as someone who might be attracted by the noise of the egg being opened.

entities.name: cedric
entities.description: A character mentioned in the story as possibly planning to attract Filch with the noise of the egg being opened.

entities.name: myrtle
entities.description: The ghost of a girl who is usually heard sobbing in the S-bend of a toilet three floors below. She gives advice to Harry on how to deal with the egg.

relationships.description: Harry is holding the egg in his wet hands.
Harry is worried that opening the egg might attract Filch.
Harry wonders whether Cedric's plan was to attract Filch with the noise of the egg being opened.
Myrtle gives advice to Harry on how to deal with the egg.
